name: Electric Bicycle Rebate
description: 10% rebate on new e-bike purchase, up to $300; income-qualified customers can receive additional $200
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers rebates for Santa Clara residents purchasing new electric bicycles, with additional incentives for income-qualified customers.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% rebate on new e-bike, up to $300
- Additional $200 for income-qualified customers
- Up to $500 total for income-qualified
- Covers standard and cargo e-bikes
- New purchases only
- For Santa Clara residents only
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Purchase new qualifying electric bicycle
3. Submit application within 60 days of purchase
4. Include proof of purchase and residency
5. Income-qualified submit additional documentation
6. Receive rebate check
